Articles.Content:
This is the smallest mk3 SSTO I could make. It has great performance and is easy to fly. 1.02 compatible. 100% fun!

![full.png](https://static.tweakers.net/ext/f/dlgdvoaad1Dsm1Nz8gUhVryi/full.png)

Literally takes off in 50 meter of runway.

![full.png](https://static.tweakers.net/ext/f/932FfftffZk0TZJhyDDvBkW6/full.png)

Keeps accelerating during a 45 degree climb. Level off at 12km to get some speed.

![full.png](https://static.tweakers.net/ext/f/Mp7L7oNLCB2eGRaa3no6YY6g/full.png)

Loads of fuel left!

[Download](http://kerbalx.com/Chris_2/SmallMK3SSTO)
Everywhere I tell ya, things like these! XD rep+
